description:
Carlo is a sexy Puerto Rican. When he arrived, he was very excited and ready to go, with a great "you only live once" attitude. He's very athletic, and has evolved from playing football, baseball, track, and basketball to pretty much anything that keeps him sweating.
He has a very sensual look to him, with full lips and dark eyes that smolder. His balls hang nice and low and his ass... well, you can tell it's an ass that can run a good sprint!
Carlo was not shy at all, and had no problem dropping his shorts and showing off his smooth, tan, muscled body...
title: Carlo
